statements: DELETE FROM RoboticEquipmentMaintenance WHERE robot_id = 100 AND maintenance_schedule = 'Weekly'
DELETE FROM RoboticEquipmentMaintenance WHERE maintenance_schedule = 'Monthly' AND robot_id = 200
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE robot_id = 100 AND maintenance_date = '2022-05-15';
DELETE FROM robot_equipment WHERE robot_name = 'RoboCop' OR robot_id = 200;
DELETE FROM MaintenanceTechnicians WHERE technician_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM maintenance_history WHERE equipment_id = 100 AND maintenance_type = 'Preventive';
DELETE FROM maintenance_history WHERE equipment_id = 101 AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
